title: Block font with a thin, internal pinstripe throughout.
content:
The font used for 'ARTURO' below as used by Juventus on their Facebook updates. The closet I've found is Ostrich Sans Inline ( [http://www.dafont.com/ostrich-sans-inline.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064832/http:/www.dafont.com/ostrich-sans-inline.font "http://www.dafont.com/ostrich-sans-inline.font")) but it's not blocky enough.

Thanks,  
Simon

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064832im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10405271_902599633100600_2062396916973582822_n_3518.png)
